query:
INSERT INTO blood_requests(
                staff_id,
                blood_group_id,
                priority_id,
                title,
                max_people,
                start_time,
                end_time
            )
            VALUES (
                $1,
                (SELECT id FROM blood_groups WHERE name = $2),
                (SELECT id FROM request_priorities WHERE name = $3),
                $4,
                $5,
                $6,
                $7
            )
            RETURNING id
